thumb.title: Valve Song: COUNT TO THREE ■ feat. Ellen McLain (official GLaDOS), The Stupendium & Gabe Newell
thumb.description: If anyone from the chalkeaters wants this taken down, then I will gladly do so. I am just uploading this here for my own purposes.Download/Stream “Count to Three”: Spotify ▶ https://thechalkeate.rs/counttothree_... All platforms ▶ https://thechalkeate.rs/counttothree Drop a like and a comment, it helps to spread the video! Support The Chalkeaters on Patreon ▶ / thechalkeaters The Chalkeaters Originals on Spotify ▶ https://thechalkeate.rs/discography ▶ Join our official / discord Server This is a song about a game studio that brought us a variety of classics, but never released any game with number 3 in its name — VALVE. The company behind Half-Life, Portal, Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, Left 4 Dead, DOTA 2 and much more. Featuring: ELLEN MCLAIN, the official GLaDOS from “Portal” and "Portal 2" as GLaDOS! THE STUPENDIUM, the amazing nerdcore artist, as Gabe Newell! And finally, Valve’s CEO, GABE NEWELL himself, who sang a couple of lines for the beginning and the end of the song! Follow The Chalkeaters on Spotify ▶ https://thechalkeate.rs/spotify Twitter ▶ / thechalkeaters Instagram ▶ / thechalkeaters VK ▶ https://vk.com/thechalkeaters ■■■
